channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023080069
item.description:
Report X-2023080069

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS OFFLOADED FROM TRAILER AND PUT ON ROLLERS, LEAK WAS DISCOVERED, INHOUSE CLEAN UP FROM QA WITH GLOVES, HAZMAT BIN AND ABSORBANT PADS DescribePack: THE SEAL ON THE LID WAS DEFECTED AND LEAKING DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT BIN AND ABSORBANT PADS

item.title: Report X-2023071229
item.description:
Report X-2023071229

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found in a trailer during with a wet bottom and was taken to the hazmat cage where it was found to be rain damage on the box but also that the bottles inside were leaking from the lids. DescribePack: Hazmats were leaking from the lids. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ensure proper preparation for transport.

item.description:
Report X-2023071159

  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered to be wet when unloading from a trailer and brought to QA. DescribePack: The bottles are leaking through the caps even though they are secured. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bin to contain the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023070108
item.description:
Report X-2023070108

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-08
  • City: WYOMING
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER FOUND PACKAGE LEAKING WITHIN TRAILER AND LET THEIR SUPERVISOR KNOW. A RESPONDER CLEANED AND CONTAINED THE SPILL. THEN BROUGHT IT BACK TO PSC WHERE THE SUPERVISOR CALLED IT INTO ADG AS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
